item.description: Take the leap- drive out of your meetup area meetup ladies and gentlemen=- life is too short to only venture to New Haven area. Join us for a Swing, and Latin dance mixer party mingle. $25 inlcudes a dance lesson at 7:30pm then party mingle and mix-Costumes welcome- prizes and fun Drinks and appetizers/snacks provided and lesson- want to contribute and bring to share always welcome. If you dont want to dance thats ok=sit and hang out.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,
